name: Uncaged Zoo
description:
Made in Unity for Bogazici Gamejam 2021 under 48 Hours.

Theme : May The Best One Lose!

----------------------------------Features---------------------------------

Randomized Dungeon : Everytime you press start the game.You will play in a random dungeon so every gameplay will be different (works 9 out of 10 time)

Sh*tty AI : you shouldn't expect an animal attacking you have the accuracy of a soldier (totally a design choice)

Fluid Gameplay : As a Rabbit you can Dash to any direction

----------------------------------Controls---------------------------------

W : Move Up

A : Move Left

S : Move Down

D : Move Right

Space : Dash in any direction

Left Mouse Button : Shoot

----------------------------------Credits----------------------------------

Cem Kaan Uğur : Developer - Designer

Cem Celik : Developer - Level Designer

Ege Canibek : Pixelartist

Waltson Tanaka : Sound Designer

Fatih Koc : Developer

-----------------------------------Notes-----------------------------------

We are currently working on the game expect an update in the next week when gamejam's vote period ends.
Changelog:

  • More Fast-Paced Combat
  • Revamped Overall Sounds
  • Minimap
  • Bugfixes
